ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: From what thing did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Of what substance God created him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Out of what did Allah create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: From what has God created him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: From what did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: From what thing did He create him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Of what thing did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Of what did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: From what thing doth He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Of what [stuff] has He created him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Of what thing hath He created him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: From what did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: From what stuff hath He created him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: From what thing did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: From what did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: From what did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: From what substance did He create him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:18] From what thing has He created him? (an interrogative meant as an affirmative, which He then explains by saying):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (From what thing doth He create him?) He says: let him think about his own person: from what did He create him as a living being?
